attributes.action: Fund a monument to celebrate Brexit
attributes.additional_details: Over many years there have been a large number of people who have dedicated their lives to helping Britain be free of the European Union, they have given years of their lives campaigning and working for the cause of British democracy and sovereignty, a monument to Brexit would be a way of recognising all those, some who are no longer with us, and remembering them.
attributes.background: Now the UK has been set free from the European Union and is once again a democratic and sovereign nation, there should be a monument erected in central London to commemorate this historic moment.
